comment: Brian is AMAZING!  Really takes time to help you.  Responds really quick.  Great Professor.
This man is all around amazing!  Took time to meet with me many times.  Take him!
Good class overall, but he grades VERY harsh, especially the discussions.
Amazing!  Really knows his stuff.  I wish he taught all my classes.
Brian is so great!  He is very responsive and is interested in your success.  Took a great deal of time with me to better understand things.  Fantastic!  Take him if you can.
Brian was so great!  He responds quickly and really cares about you.  TAKE HIM!
Brian was great.  Very quick to respond to questions. Learned a lot!

Second time taking Prof. Wooten. This man is all around amazing. Great teacher and very caring and understanding. Took him for ISD3100 over the summer and it was easy and organized. He is very reachable outside of normal hours and overall just a really genuine person too. A few quizzes open note, a couple of discussions & one big research paper

This class should be part of the Coles Business program, I learned as much if not more from it then other classes that are required. He is very open and responds quickly to emails, he will listen and offer assistance on other subjects, as he helped me get in contact with someone to assist me on some classes. He is very good and I highly recommend.
Take Professor Wooten if you can.  Always willing to help.  Learned a lot
Amazing Professor.  Responds quickly and helpful.
Brian is by far the best professor I have ever had.  He went out of way to make sure that we had all our questions answered. TAKE HIM if you can!!
Brian is so responsive.  He responded to my questions within minutes sometimes.  His material is interesting and he really cares about his students.  Take him if you can!!!!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Brian is as AMAZING!  He treated us like adults and was always approachable.  He went way beyond to support us and set clear expectations.  I wish he taught all my classes.
Amazing Professor!  Provides clear direction and incredibly approachable.  Take him if you can
NEVER TAKE HIM, he is such a tough grader, And cuts points off at the most tiniest things.

Professor Wooten is absolutely wonderful! I took PERS2700 as a 7-week course and there were four quizzes and a final all open note and no lockdown. There is one final career exploration paper and it is very doable. He is very helpful and makes his expectations very clear. This class was quite easy and an easy A especially for a 7-week course.

He truly cares about his students. He is one of the nicest professors Ive ever met, so easy to talk to. In his world of work class, the tests were a little tricky but based on the readings he provides online. If you pay attention you will pass. He had the class do fun collaborative activities.

I had him for PERS2700. he's a great professor, and I really liked him as a person. However, his assignments were unnecessarliy difficult and we were required to read 5-10 (sometimes more) long articles every week and take quizzes and do a discussion every week. so get ready to read a lot. There are 2 projects that are worth a lot of points.

This class was interesting and pretty easy. There were some major assignments like doing shadow work; I think five pages? Overall, simple class, with discussion boards every week and a quiz. The lectures add a little bit of information to the course.
Professor Wooten is great.  He really cares about us.  He offered the opportunity to meet 1-1 to discuss our future plans and he connected me with a guy in my career area.  Take him if you can!
Brian really cares about his students.  He goes way beyond to support you.  I wish he taught all my classes.

He is a very cool guy. I took him for World of Work. He wanted to get to know us as people and we had multiple opportunities to set up one-on-one's. You learn a lot about yourself in this class. Quiz every week, discussion boards, 5-10 page Final, etc. Keep in mind, this class is 7-weeks long so you will have more work in a faster pace than usual.

Brian is an amazing professor.  He is very responsive and really interested in your success. When I emailed him with questions, I received immediate responses.  The content was pertinent and I am using the projects I completed in this class now in my work.

professor Wooten is very knowledgable. He is a tough grader though and his quizzes are not very reflective of what we learn in class. For one quiz he requires you to read at least 10 articles some of which are very long. And you must read them in detail because his quizzes ask specific questions about specific articles.
Great information.  Every student should take this class with Brian.  He knows his stuff and pushes you to do your best.  I wish he taught all my classes.
Great Professor.  Always available.  Very good information. Take this class!
Great Professor!   Responds quickly to students.

Very easy but changed how he graded on one assignment when I did all the other ones the same. And messed my grade up by releasing the wrong quiz for the week (which I did), and giving little time to go back and do the correct quiz.

Super easy class, one big final research paper, 5 discussion post and quizzes. took it during the 7 week session and it didn't add on a huge workload. For the research paper you do need to shadow people in your career field and interview some people so I would take that into account.
Great teacher.   Cares about the students.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Very easy A, cares about students. One quiz a week and they all go hand in hand with the PowerPoints. Take this class if you can!
Good professor and he cares about students.

This is a 7-week online course, and the learning content is relatively small. One or two pdfs a week, and some online articles or videos. The answers to the quiz are all in the pdf. If you encounter difficulties in learning, he will help you solve them, and it is very easy to get an A.
Very approachable.   Cares about students.

This class was a half semester class that consisted of maybe 8 grades total. There was very little direction which was ironic considering this class was about effective leadership. I passed the class with a B, but will lose my HOPE scholarship for the foreseeable future because of what I feel were unrealistic expectations placed on me in this class
Brian really cares! The work load is easy and it's an enjoyable class.
Professor Wooten was awesome! He was very interactive with his students and cares a lot. He is not a hard grader and has a lot of participation in his classes. definitely would take him again!

Brian is great and really cares. This was a 1/2 term in person and 100% ideal. The final project is a lot but you work on it through the weeks leading up to it and he gives good feedback. If you follow the guide and answer all the questions for discussions you'll do well. Put in a little effort and you'll be good.

This class was cool a lot of great assignments, though there was a few times we could not get in touch with him because of system issues but he made up for it and gave us a fair amount of time to finish assignments. I receive an A.
Brian is a great professor and really cares about the success of his students.  He spend a great deal of time with us and very much concerned about us.
Expects way too much for a freshman seminar class. Assigns a lot of nonsense work.

He's very intelligent and knows his material. Brian wants the students to succeed and will work with them. He has a lot of papers and grades more thoroughly than I expected. As long as you work hard, listen, and go to class you're good.

Best teacher ever!!!I love this man.. Go to class and participate and it'll be a breeze..Make sure you actually read 3 cups of tea..He gives a great study guide..As long as you read articles( which are no longer than 5 pages) the quizzes will be eazy....Wooten in the best..Highly RECOMMEND KSU 2290!!!!!!!!!!!!
Great class.  Really cares about students.  I wish he taught all my classes
Class is really fun and professor wooten really cares about the students. Easy A!
Brian is a good man.  He is understanding and really cares if you succeed.  I forgot to do something and he was happy to take it a few days late.  My favorite teacher this semester
take this man...you may be sick of hearing about leadership, but he's a wonderful guy and its an easy a

He is a wonderful person who cares about all of his students.  He tries to find ways for all of his students to succeed!  The class can seem a little overwhelming at times, but is not too much to get through.
Brian is GREAT!   He wants to connect with his students and is really challenging.  He is an AWESOME professor.  I learned more in this class than in most others.

He is nice and seems to enjoy teaching.  I expected this class to be easy but I had more work than any of my other classes. Don't take him if you aren't willing to work hard. The games we played the first few weeks were fun.

He made the class interesting and we played a lot of fun silly games! You really bond with everybody in the class and especially the professor. Many complain that KSU1101 is a pointless class, but he actually made it FUN. If you forget to turn in something, he doesn't mind, just as long as you do it.Very helpful, understanding, and nice!

He is so much fun. Even though this was a freshman class that I thought I would be bored in, Brian actually did some cool interactive stuff that made the class quite enjoyable and a good experience for my first year in college. Everyone should meet Brian.
Wooten is great! He's always energetic and seems to really like teaching.

Brian is such a great guy. He made my first semester at KSU easy. He is an easy guy to talk to and will help you in any way. His class was fun and something I looked forward to. I would definitely suggest getting him for first year seminar.
